title: LOGIN ISSUE
body: ROIT THE PROBLEM FOR AUTHENTICATION IS HAPPENING AGAIN, IT STARTED IN LAST FEW GAMES WHEN IT WAS LAGGING HEAVILY, I ALSO POSTED A DISCUSSION BUT CANT FIND IT PLEASE HELP

replies.body: Were you able to run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide just as before?  Your settings may have changed overtime and may need a tune up.  Let me know!
I dont know why the support page never opens i have been trying it for like forever.. any reason

Could be part of the connection issue, if something is blocking you from reaching our services.  You may also need to try another browser or disable extensions.  If all else fails, you can reach out to us through email via support@riotgames.com!
porocles dude help me tomorrow saturday cant play yet
Hey!  Were you able to reach out to us through the email?  Toss me the ticket number and I can check it out for you.

hey poro i mailed to support i can login now but the thing is that i cant play games cause they are not woring properly like after a few time my hero just roams he does not attack or use ability just like it happens when it lags
i sent a email poro dude help me
which browser you recommend i am using google chrome
yes tried the links from earlier same result blank page

Thanks for the update, though that sucks to hear.  :(  In that case, grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain some logs and attach them in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can work with you directly to check out what's going on.  We'll see you there!
It is now SOLVED. Keep in mind that Riot Games does work 24/7 on any SERVER related issue(s). Thank you!
I am having the issue right now on EUW. Tried on 2 different PCs
